leaving the circus.

I could've.

-This. -[nose honks]

translation.en: Bob and Talia.

to "pull my finger." But I'm no good at running a circus.

-I eat dog biscuits. -And he hates it.
-They're dog biscuits. -Talks about it every day.
I have a right to talk about it every day.
Wait a minute. You're special, kid. Your uncle saw that. We all did.

He grew up.
Owen, this is what you've always wanted.

-[nose squeaks] -[performers murmur]

I will quit my father's company

translation.en: -Hold on. What are-- -No, I don't want to hear it.
-Zoe. -I'm doing it.
Doing it. Nope. Owen, I already got the nose on.

translation.en: -That's a big deal. -I don't care.
I've always loved this circus, and I know you do, too!

Just need a little time to come around. I get it. Besides, should be fun.

Still can't believe she would throw her life away

[chuckling] Why, I was just...
Seeing if the chair fit?
Fine Corinthian leather that cradles your butt.

translation.en: So supple.
So...
What's the word?
Disturbing?
-Brock! -[yelps]
With Zoe gone to that circus, I may as well consider having you take over the company.

translation.en: [shudders] Oh, joy.
Okay, what if we try up-up-down-down- left-right-left-right-B-A-start?
I don't know, Binkley. I tried that earlier, and--

It's not funny. Does it bother you when I'm this close?
-Your breath is not great. -Yeah.
Um, this is too close.

Here's your morning coffee, Mr. Woodley, just how you like it. Why thank you, Brock!

translation.de: Kompliziert? Es ist Mathe. Man braucht Rechenschieber,

Do you know how anything works? [chuckles]

You try it, Huntington.

[Zoe] Hey.

[giggles] I love the circus. Circus, circus, circus circus!

Whoa. Zoe.

I hate this.

Enjoy the show, folks.
Okay, ladies and gentlemen!
Behold the death-defying feats

Doom!

[audience chanting] Animals! Animals! Animals!

[Owen] Chesterfield.

vulnerable.

Very hot!

It has to be in here somewhere! I looked like 100 times. It's not--
translation.de: -Er muss da sein. -Ich hab 100 Mal nachgesehen. Er ist weg.

translation.en: -Trust me. What? No! They-- -Try this one.
Maybe there's just too many cookies to see it! Maybe eat some more to clear up some space.
translation.de: Wir sehen ihn vor lauter Keksen nicht. Iss einige, um Platz zu machen.

translation.en: -Try this one. -The box always stays full.
Maybe not, if you eat faster. You've got to eat faster!
Please eat faster! Please eat faster! Zoe! Zoe! Stop! It's not here!
translation.de: -Bitte iss schneller! -Zoe, stopp! Er ist nicht hier!

translation.en: Look, the box keeps adding new animals, but not new human cookies.
translation.de: Die Kiste zaubert immer neue Tiere, aber nicht Menschen-Kekse.

translation.en: There's only one of those, and it's gone, Zoe.
translation.de: Davon gibt es nur einen und der ist weg, Zoe.

translation.en: -It's... -No!
No, I will not accept that. There's got to be a way to get you human again.
translation.de: Das akzeptiere ich nicht. Irgendwie wirst du wieder ein Mensch.

translation.en: -Zoe-- -In the meantime, we're just gonna tough it out, gonna make it work.
I mean, how hard can it be?
[Bulletman] I... I hold it true.
I hold it to be true.
What's wrong, kid?
What's the matter? What happened to you? You eat a bad banana? [chuckles]
translation.de: Was hast du? Schlechte Banane gegessen?

translation.en: No, I'm just...
Oh, look, kid, look.
I know it's been hard these last couple weeks.
translation.de: Ich weiß, es war schwer in den letzten Wochen.

translation.en: Not being human and all, spending your life without opposable thumbs.
translation.de: Nicht Mensch zu sein und all das, ein Leben ohne opponierbare Daumen.

translation.en: You're shedding everywhere.
-Shunned by the entire-- -You're not helping.
You didn't let me finish. You're shedding everywhere, shunned by the entire world.
translation.de: Es kommt noch mehr. Du verlierst Haare, verstoßen von allen.

translation.en: -Okay. -But look at the bright side!
You and Zoe brought life back to this circus.
translation.de: Du und Zoe, ihr habt diesen Zirkus wiederbelebt.

translation.en: You've not only brought our circus family together, but you've brought tons of other families together
translation.de: Ihr habt unsere Zirkus-Familie vereint, und viele andere Familien.

translation.en: to laugh and cheer and eat overpriced cotton candy. -[laughs] -Come on.
translation.de: Sie lachten, jubelten und aßen überteuerte Zuckerwatte.

translation.en: That's gotta count for something, right?
translation.de: Das muss was wert sein, oder?

translation.en: Chin up, kid. You're making people happy.
translation.de: Kopf hoch, Junge. Du machst die Leute glücklich.

translation.en: That's no small thing.
Clowns are notoriously horrible liars.
translation.de: Jeder weiß, Clowns sind schreckliche Lügner.

translation.en: -What are you-- -I've just come to talk, my boy.
-[Chesterfield] Ladies and... -Make it quick.
Just a moment of your time.
[Chesterfield] ...the return of Buffalo Bob's...
Oh, yes, the grand re-opening
of Buffalo Bob's Rootin' Tootin' Animal Circus.
translation.de: von Buffalo Bobs traumhaft tollem Tierzirkus.

translation.en: Odd that you kept my brother's name.
Because it was his circus. What do you want, Horatio?
translation.de: Weil es sein Zirkus war. Was willst du?

translation.en: I have a proposal for you. What could you have that I would possibly--
translation.de: -Ich habe einen Vorschlag. -Was könntest du haben, das ich…

translation.en: I'm offering you a chance to become human again.
translation.de: Die Chance, wieder zum Menschen zu werden.

translation.en: Wait.
That's-- Is that-- Oh, yes.
My cookie! Give it--
Wouldn't want me to crush it to bits, would you? No, no, no! Please!
translation.de: -Den soll ich nicht zerbröseln, oder? -Nein, bitte.

translation.en: Just tell me what you want for it?
translation.de: Sag mir einfach, was du dafür willst.

translation.en: Why, my boy, I simply want what was rightfully mine.
translation.de: Ich will nur, was mir rechtmäßig zusteht.

translation.en: The fame, the fortune...
the circus.
-What? -Once I have those animal crackers--
You want the crackers, too? The circus is no good without them, is it?
translation.de: -Die Cracker auch? -Ohne sie ist der Zirkus nutzlos.

translation.en: I... I can't!
I'll only make this offer once. If you refuse...
translation.de: Ich mache das Angebot nur einmal. Wenn du dich weigerst…

translation.en: Well, that's how the cookie crumbles.
translation.de: …dann gehe ich dir nicht länger auf den Keks.

translation.en: -Human again. -Think of your family, Owen.
-My family? -Yes, your family.
What would they want you to do?
translation.de: Was würden sie von dir erwarten?

translation.en: My family. Do you think they want a filthy beast for a husband?
translation.de: -Meine Familie. -Denkst du, sie wollen eine Bestie?

translation.en: A father?
[Owen] My family.
Yes, yes, your family. Now, do we have a deal?
translation.de: -Meine Familie. -Ja, deine Familie. Kommen wir ins Geschäft?

translation.en: -No. -Excellent! Wait. What?
-No deal. -Are you mad?
Do you wish to remain a wretched animal for the rest of your life?
translation.de: Willst du für immer ein elendes Tier bleiben?

translation.en: You know what?
If being a wretched animal lets me keep my family together,
translation.de: Wenn ich als elendes Tier meine Familie zusammenhalte…

translation.en: -then, yeah, sign me up. -Oh!
Because I'll be a gorilla or a horse or a rhinoceros
translation.de: Denn ich werde zum Gorilla oder Pferd oder Nashorn

translation.en: or whatever filthy beast I have to be
translation.de: oder zu jeder anderen Bestie, wenn nötig,

translation.en: to keep my family together.
translation.de: wenn es darum geht, meine Familie zusammenzuhalten.

translation.en: I was afraid you would have too much of my brother in you.
translation.de: Ich hatte befürchtet, dass du meinem Bruder sehr ähnelst.

translation.en: Oh, well. It seems we'll have to do this the hard way.
translation.de: Dann müssen wir es wohl auf die harte Tour machen.

translation.en: What?
What did you do?
Apparently, one does not need to eat the entire animal cracker
translation.de: Offenbar muss man nicht den ganzen Cracker essen,

translation.en: to assume the attributes of said animal.
translation.de: um die Eigenschaften des besagten Tieres anzunehmen.

translation.en: -[roars] -No!
Hey, give me that!
-Now then... -[Owen] No!
...let's conclude our business, shall we?
-Get off me. -After all, a deal is a deal.
And I would rather not deal with an 800-pound gorilla.
Yes, I would rather deal with pathetic little you.
translation.de: Deine armselige Mensch-Version ist viel geschäftiger.

translation.en: Hey, what's all the barking about?
[gasps] Owen!
You're you again!
Now, attention acrobats, jugglers, stage hands, clowns.
They make me sick.
I would like to announce the immediate takeover of this circus.
translation.de: Ich verkünde die sofortige Übernahme dieses Zirkus.

translation.en: As of this moment, you are all fired.
translation.de: Ab sofort seid ihr alle gefeuert.

translation.en: -[cannon booms] -Bullet...
...man!
Nice work, Bulletman. Everybody grab a cookie!
translation.de: Toll, Bulletman. Nehmt alle einen Keks!

translation.en: No! Stop them!
Is that the best you got? Hey, Stabby, my turn!
translation.de: Mehr hast du nicht zu bieten? Jetzt ich.

translation.en: [Binkley] Excuse us. Sorry.
Why did you drag me here? You know how I feel about the--
translation.de: Warum hast du mich hergeschleppt? Du weißt, was ich vom…

translation.en: Did you see that? That bunny rabbit turtle thing
translation.de: Habt ihr das gesehen? Das Schildkröten-Häschen

translation.en: just got drop-kicked by a duck-billed platypus!
translation.de: Habt ihr das gesehen? Das Schildkröten-Häschen wurde von einem Schnabeltier geschlagen!

translation.en: It's just a classic.
-Horatio, got the box! -Ya!
Got it.
Oh, poop.
Thank you very much, clown!
Tally-ho!
-[Owen] Got it! -[grunts]
And I've got you!
Sorry, Horatio, but I can't... [chomps]
stick around.
Fools!
Look at you!
A hippopotamus.
Giraffes.
Monkeys. [chuckles]
You lack the vision to truly create something the world has never seen.
translation.de: Euch fehlt die Vision, etwas zu kreieren, was die Welt noch nie sah.

translation.en: You use them to entertain,
but I... I will use them to rule the world!
translation.de: aber ich werde sie benutzen, um die Welt zu regieren!

translation.en: Behold!
I am Horatio the Chimera.
I am a god!
[Bob] Horatio! Brother, stop this!
What did you say? Please, Horatio.
Uncle Bob?
-Robert? -[Talia] You must stop this madness!
But I thought you were both killed.
translation.de: Aber ich dachte, ihr seid tot.

translation.en: Not killed, but we can never be human again.
translation.de: Nicht tot, aber wir können nie wieder zum Mensch werden.

translation.en: You see, that fire you started destroyed our human cookies.
translation.de: Dein Feuer hat unsere Menschen-Kekse zerstört.

translation.en: I didn't mean to.
And...
what's in the past is in the past.
But look around you, brother.
Is this really how you want to be seen?
How you want to live your life? Like this?
translation.de: Wie willst du dein Leben leben? So?

translation.en: A monster?
Better this than a broken-down old man, Robert.
translation.de: Besser das, als ein alter, gebrochener Mann.

translation.en: Or a dog. Don't you think?
translation.de: Oder ein Hund, findest du nicht?

translation.en: What I think, Horatio, is...
...you're better than this.
Then you're a fool!
No!
Bulletman, get in your cannon! [Bulletman] Bulletman.
Don't eat this until after I fire you. Bulletman!
Ready?
[muffled] Bulletman!
Bulletman! [laughs]
Bulletman, now!
Oh, poop.
Kitty!
-Mackenzie! No! -[Owen] No!
No!
Gotcha!
-Hi, Auntie Kitty. -[sighs]
Hello, my little monkey Mackenzie darling.
This ends now.
Do you not see the utter futility of your endeavors, boy?
translation.de: Erkennst du die Sinnlosigkeit deiner Bemühungen nicht?

translation.en: Can you not smell the destruction of all you know and love?
translation.de: Riechst du nicht die Zerstörung von allem, was du kennst und liebst?

translation.en: You are lost.
There is no hope!
[gasps] Owen!
[Zoe] Mackenzie!
-[screeches] -Mackenzie!
[Zoe] No!
Mackenzie, jump!
Zoe, look.
It has to be somewhere. Come on.
I got it. Zoe?
Don't mess with my family!
translation.de: Leg dich nicht mit meiner Familie an!

translation.en: Chesterfield! Now!
No. No!
Blast you all!
I'm Horatio P. Huntington!
I will not be silenced! I will have my revenge!
translation.de: Ihr bringt mich nicht zum Schweigen! Ich werde mich rächen!

translation.en: Victory shall be mine!
What are you doing? Unhand me this instant, you over-muscled oaf!
translation.de: Was tust du? Lass mich los, du übertrainierter Übeltäter!

translation.en: I hold it true, what e'er befall.
translation.de: Für wahr halt ich's, was einmal war.

translation.en: I feel it when I sorrow most.
translation.de: Ich fühle es in meinem größten Leiden.

translation.en: 'Tis better to have loved and lost
translation.de: Besser, Liebe zu finden und dann zu scheiden.

translation.en: than never to have loved...
at all.
-Bulletman! -Bulletman! Bulletman!
How will we ever top this performance?
translation.de: Wie sollen wir den Auftritt je übertreffen?

translation.en: [sighs] I have no idea.
[Zucchini] What about the Zucchini?
What about you?
Change me back!
Let me explain. You ate the broken pieces, you doofuses!
translation.de: Ich erkläre es. Ihr habt die kaputten Cracker gegessen, ihr Idioten!

translation.en: That means you have broken pieces in the box.
translation.de: Die Stücke in der Kiste sind zerbrochen.

translation.en: Don't you get it? It's gonna take time to figure out who's who.
translation.de: Versteht ihr? Es wird dauern, herauszufinden, wer wer ist.

translation.en: You want his arm and his leg on your body?
translation.de: Oder willst du seinen Arm und sein Bein an dir?

translation.en: [laughs] Tiny little body. Point taken.
-It's cool. -We're good.
Take your time. The Zucchini can wait.
translation.de: Lass dir Zeit. Die Zucchini kann warten.

translation.en: How dare you? Do you not know what I am?
translation.de: Wie kannst du es wagen? Wisst ihr nicht, was ich bin?

translation.en: Who I am? Let me out of here!
translation.de: Wer ich bin? Lasst mich hier raus!

translation.en: Please?
Oh, I've missed those lips.
-We did it, Zoe. -We did.
Aw. Just wish my dad could've-- Could've what, sweetie?
-Dad? -I saw what you two did out there.
The heroics! The chemistry!
translation.de: All diese Heldentaten. All die Chemie.

translation.en: That whole changing into animals thing!
I mean, just fantastic!
Owen, I'm so sorry for the way I've treated you.
translation.de: Owen, es tut mir leid, wie ich dich behandelt habe.

translation.en: You're no nincompoop, quite the opposite.
translation.de: Du bist kein Depp, im Gegenteil.

translation.en: And, Zoe, you are an amazing woman.
translation.de: Und Zoe, du bist eine tolle Frau.

translation.en: But, of course, I've always known that.
I love you, Dad.
-Grandpa! -Ha-ha! Hey, there, little monkey!
You were terrific!
Guess what, Grandpa. I'm in the circus! In it? You're gonna be the star!
translation.de: -Weißt du was, Opa? Ich bin im Zirkus. -Im Zirkus? Du wirst der Star!

translation.en: Let's go get you cleaned up.
So, it turns out Binkley is precisely the genius you said she was.
translation.de: Binkley ist wirklich ein Genie, genau wie du gesagt hast.

translation.en: Oh, gee.
[Woodley] She's concocted something quite amazing.
translation.de: Sie hat etwas wirklich Tolles erfunden.

translation.en: [Chesterfield] Binkley really was a genius.
Wait till you see what she came up with.
translation.de: Wartet, bis ihr seht, was sie erfand.

translation.en: So, how'd it go?
We're about to find out.
-They just went on sale minutes ago. -Uh, what went on sale?
Remember those dog biscuits that turned our skin crazy colors?
translation.de: Die Keckse färbten dich, wisst ihr noch?

translation.en: -Vividly. -How could I forget?
-I think I threw up on your shoes. -Oof.
Binkley found a way to turn those failed experiments into a new business venture!
translation.de: Binkley hat aus den gescheiterten Experimenten ein neues Geschäft gemacht.

translation.en: [Zoe] Oh, so what do they do?
See for yourself.
[Zoe] They just love it!
Look at them. They're having a blast!
But, I mean, how will they change back?
-There we go. Yup. -Wow.
We thought it best not to advertise that part. [laughs]
translation.de: Für den Teil haben wir keine Werbung gemacht.

translation.en: -That was a big one. -[laughs]
But that's fun. Wow, you still find it funny, I see. Still like it.
translation.de: -Aber lustig. -Du findest es noch lustig, okay.

translation.en: Ha-ha! We're going to be rich, partner.
Partner? [giggles] I've never been one of those.
translation.de: Partnerin? Das war ich noch nie.

translation.en: I mean, like in a game maybe, but not like in a business.
translation.de: Vielleicht in einem Spiel, aber nie im Geschäft.

translation.en: Bravo! Wonderful, Mackenzie. You are natural.
translation.de: Bravo! Toll, Mackenzie. Du bist ein Naturtalent.

translation.en: Daddy! Daddy! Did you see me ride the pony?
translation.de: Papi, hast du mich auf dem Pony gesehen?

translation.en: Did I? You're fantastic! Auntie Talia taught me!
translation.de: -Und ob, du warst fantastisch! -Tante Talia hat es mir gezeigt.

translation.en: [laughs] She will be the star in no time. Just like you, sweetie.
translation.de: -Sie wird in Kürze der Star sein. -So wie du, Schatz.

translation.en: Look at you, my gypsy princess.
Queen.
-Queen? -[laughs]
Do you want me to tell you your fortune?
translation.de: Soll ich dir die Zukunft vorhersagen?

translation.en: I think I already know it. Oh, yeah? What is it?
translation.de: -Ich denke, ich kenne sie schon. -Ja? Was passiert?

translation.en: I live happily ever after. [clicks tongue] Owen.
It's showtime!
Places! Let's take our places! Owen, sweetie, you're up next.
translation.de: -Los! Auf eure Positionen! -Owen, du bist dran.

translation.en: Ladies and gentlemen!
Welcome to Buffalo Bob's Rootin' Tootin' Animal Circus!
translation.de: Willkommen in Buffalo Bobs traumhaft tollem Tierzirkus!

translation.en: Prepare for...
Well, that's new.
And a little dangerous.
What's life without a little danger? Ooh. Who is that guy?
translation.de: -Was wäre das Leben ohne Gefahr? -Wer ist der Typ?

translation.en: I like that guy.
Prepare yourselves for something truly amazing!
translation.de: Machen Sie sich bereit für etwas wahrlich Beeindruckendes.

translation.en: All right.
Wish me luck. Good luck.
Prepare yourself for something truly incredible!
translation.de: Machen Sie sich bereit für etwas wahrlich Unglaubliches!

translation.en: Hey, and, you know, don't burn the place down. Prepare yourself
translation.de: -Hey, und brenne nicht alles nieder. -Machen Sie sich bereit

translation.en: for something truly magical!
♪I'm living my patience and my motivation I put them on separate teams ♪
translation.de: BASIEREND AUF "ANIMAL CRACKERS" VON SCOTT CHRISTIAN SAVA
